main_definition: The act of initiating or commencing an action, event, or process.

meanings_and_examples.example: She was excited about starting her trip to Europe next week.
The new manager is starting the implementation of the new project plan today.
At 10 o'clock, the football game will start with both teams warming up on the field.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The initial phase of learning something new
meanings_and_examples.example: She is starting to learn how to play the piano this weekend.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The first stage in a process or sequence
meanings_and_examples.example: We have completed the starting stages of our market research and will now move on to data analysis.
